about_the_game: Conrad can't commit - Esther is fed up. In a moment of weakness, she sleeps with his best friend, Eddie, and now her period is late! Conrad confronts Eddie about his affair while Conrad's ex, Charlotte, shows up to "help" Esther with a pregnancy test. Eddie deflates Conrad's by threatening to reveal a secret he's long held to protect him. Over the course of the night, webs of deceit and denial unravel, and the dawn reveals their fragile but real connection to each other.
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Conrad can't commit - Esther is fed up. In a moment of weakness, she sleeps with his best friend, Eddie, and now her period is late! Conrad confronts Eddie about his affair while Conrad's ex, Charlotte, shows up to "help" Esther with a pregnancy test. Eddie deflates Conrad's by threatening to reveal a secret he's long held to protect him. Over the course of the night, webs of deceit and denial unravel, and the dawn reveals their fragile but real connection to each other.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

short_description: Conrad can't commit. Esther is fed up. Sadly, she sleeps with his best friend, Eddie - now she's late! Conrad confronts Eddie about this. Conrad's ex, Charlotte, shows up to "help" Esther with a pee test. Eddie deflates Conrad's by threatening to reveal a secret about him.
